title: Top 5 Things To Do At The Gold Coast, Australia
text:
Home > Travel Information > Top 5 Things To Do At The Gold Coast, Australia Top 5 Things To Do At The Gold Coast, Australia By admin on July 11, 2015 Pin It 
There are many awesome things to do at the Gold Coast in Australia. It is actually located on the east coast of Australia, south of Brisbane. This place is famous for its surfing, detailed system of waterways and inland canals and long sandy beaches. 
There are many stunning and beautiful golden beaches, dinner shows and theme parks at the Gold Coast. Apart from this, visitors at this place can also have their share of entertainment by way of whale watching. 
The Gold Coast has everything that can entertain visitors and it is rightly called Australiaâ€™s holiday playground. Top Things To Do At The Gold Coast 
Some of the best things to do at the Gold Coast include: Visiting A Theme Park 
The theme parks on The Gold Coast make for one feature that sets this holiday destination in Australia apart from the other destinations. 
People who visit the Gold Coast both from overseas and interstate should make it a point to visit a theme park here. All the theme parks are quality attractions offering thrill rides along with aquatic fun. Enjoy At The Beach 
Gold Coast is popular for its beaches and if you want to take the fullest of this place then you must visit the beaches. The beaches here are huge stretches of white sand offering the perfect spot for sunshine and surf. 
Some of the main beaches that you can visit include Coolangatta, Broadbeach, Currumbin and Burleigh Heads. Exploring The Hinterland 
You can make your visit to this region a solid overall experience by going for a 45 minute rough drive to the Surfers Paradise called Hinterland. It is an oasis of scenery and greenery and it is a world away from the popular tourism hub. Taking a Cruise 
Water serves as the central theme on Gold Coast and it is not only the beaches that serve as the main reason behind this fact. The city possesses a canal system that is quite scenic and highly developed as well. 
This is the reason why you can easily take cruises that will give you the chance of exploring the city and its waters. Hot Air Ballooning 
Taking a hot air balloon ride over the Gold Coast will give you the chance of see the views of verdant rainforests, golden and sandy beaches and the sparkling ocean. These are some of the things to do at the Gold Coast.
